attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Never in my short life, or my opinion have I see such mismanagement of the country. During his time as PM, disaster has fallen on the UK ecconomy, mainly as a result of his time as Chancelor. I am afraid it is time to go Gordon.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saveenglandnow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
